content: I will also say, psychedelic drugs are actually extremely dangerous. They can be just as destructive as hard drugs like meth. There are people who have taken LSD recreationally and then ended up with a lifetime of PTSD from their trip. Do not take LSD (or psychedelics in general) without the proper guidance.

Since Jamie is so inactive, I'm going to start answering questions for him even though that's explicitly against the guidelines. I do that as someone who has experienced the realization/phenomenon (or I guess all you know is that I claim to). Just pretend I'm capy or something. And if you don't want to listen to me and only to Jamie that's fine. Just ignore what I say. 

I have never taken any LSD or other psychedelic drug. Psychedelics are most definitely not necessary to experience SR. 

Whether they might help encourage a certain mode of thinking conducive to experiencing SR? Maybe idk
